meaningMnemonic: You know 事 means "occurrence," but it also means "matter." So you can think of a <kanji>house</kanji> <kanji>matter</kanji> as  as <vocabulary>housework</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>chores</vocabulary>. Housework and chores are really just house matters that you have to deal with, after all.
readingMnemonic:
This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You haven't learned this reading of 家 yet, so here's a mnemonic to help you:

<vocabulary>Housework</vocabulary> done in a <reading>car</reading> (か) is still housework. Think of all the times you've tidied up your car. That's housework too!
